name: Anaconda

What's got you so worked up?" she asked, her voice dripping with sarcasm.

She rested one foot on a chair, the movement causing her skirt to hike up slightly and revealing more of her smooth, creamy thighs. "Why are you staring at us like that, Gira? Did something happen during your fight with Anaconda?" she teased, rubbing one foot against the other absentmindedly.

"Y-yes," he stammered, trying to maintain his focus. "She used some hypnotic technique... it made me feel like I was getting a... a titfuck."

The heroines exchanged skeptical glances but didn't seem too worried. Gira felt frustration rising along with his unwanted arousal. The combination of their seductive postures and the memories of Anaconda's powerful hypnosis were taking a toll on his resolve. It was getting harder to think clearly as lewd fantasies began clouding his judgement more strongly than before.
